variant of 只[zhi3]

sentences.english: The weather became so bad that they had to turn back.
sentences.chinese: 天气变得很坏，他们只好原路而归了。

sentences.english: She get left her key in the office or get to toce the gate open.
sentences.chinese: 她把钥匙忘在了办公室，只好强行把门打开。

sentences.english: I have no idea what they are going to say, so I'll have to play it by ear.
sentences.chinese: 我一点不知道他们将会说什么，所以我只好见机行事。

sentences.english: It was raining cats and dogs outside, so we had to stay at home.
sentences.chinese: 外面大雨滂沱，我们只好呆在家里。

sentences.english: L2. Due to the destination is an inland city, we have to arrange sea-land intermodal transportation.
sentences.chinese: 由于目的地是内陆城市，我们只好安排海陆联运。

sentences.english: Had to wear long pants, but still hold tight the shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 只好穿上长衣长裤，却仍然抱紧双肩。

sentences.english: The barrel was nearly empty and I had to climb right inside to get my apple.
sentences.chinese: 苹果桶快空了，我只好钻进去拿苹果。

sentences.english: Yellow to porch suffer Hong Kong police, who had to go to taking home for help.
sentences.chinese: 黄以轩遭受香港警方通缉，只好前去去晏家求助。

sentences.english: Now I have to take a later flight.
sentences.chinese: 现在我只好坐晚一般的航班了。

sentences.english: We had to abandon the car and walk the rest of the way.
sentences.chinese: 我们只好弃车，步行赶剩下的路。

sentences.english: We had to stuff the ventilator shafts up to stop the smoke entering the room.
sentences.chinese: 为了阻止烟进入室内，我们只好把通风道堵起来。

sentences.english: But the method used to adjust kerning to adjust.
sentences.chinese: 没办法，只好用调整字距的方法来调整。

sentences.english: I wanted his support, so I couldn’t laugh.
sentences.chinese: 我希望得到他的支持，只好憋住笑。

sentences.english: Youll have to make do with cold meat for dinner.
sentences.chinese: 晚餐你只好将就一下用冷肉了。

sentences.english: Because before Wang Lan owes the white dragon favor, she promised to come down.
sentences.chinese: 因为之前汪兰欠着白龙人情，她只好答应下来。
所以我们只好绕道而行。

to brace oneself to do sth/to put a bold face on it/to summon up courage/to force oneself to
